manticore.presentation
Class TerminalController

java.lang.Object
  manticore.presentation.PresentationController
      manticore.presentation.TerminalController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class TerminalController
extends PresentationController

Represents a terminal command line tool presentation controller.

istream - The input stream that the terminal should use

notify

public void notify(Event event)
Recieves events and does nothing. This method is useful when overriden.

Parameters:
event - Event occurred

addBusinessController

public void addBusinessController(BusinessController controller)
Adds a business controller on top of the terminal creating a command subject of the same name and associating the business controller to it. These controllers are injected into the commands of the terminal using reflection. The command classes should be located in the commandsPackage used to create this terminal and must have the same name as its business controllers. For example: BusinessController: PostController CommandGroup: PostCommands

Overrides:
addBusinessController in class PresentationController
Parameters:
controller - Business controller to add

showHelp

public void showHelp()
Shows the terminal help in the print stream used to create this terminal.

quit

public void quit()
Asks the user for confirmation, and if the user says 'yes' or 'y' quits the whole application.
